channel.title: Posts on Ladida Wovens*
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ladida Wovens*

item.title: Slow fashon and handweaving
item.description: Wearing your baby, or wearing stylish functional accessories? Ladida is the whimsical, easygoing approach to handwoven garments. With an asterisk for explorations in hand spinning, knitting, dyeing and other fiber arts.
